titles.title: A concurrent resolution establishing procedure for expedited consideration by the Congress of certain bills and joint resolutions submitted by the President.

action.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, requiring that if one Committee reports, the other Committee has thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Spending, Budget, Account.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Establishes congressional procedures for consideration of special messages submitted by the President proposing to rescind all or part of any item of appropriation provided in an approved appropriation bill.
